reviews.text: My goodness! What can I say about the Andrássy Kúria Hotel?
reviews.title: A Hidden Gemstone

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In the village of Tarcal, at 94 Fö út, Northeast from Budapest, along the M3 and M30 highways, then at the city of Miskolc turn-off, take the left turn onto the National route 37 towards Szerencs (home of the former Hungarian chocolate manufacturer).
reviews.title: Outstanding spa, great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Go a few kilometres further along the route 37 and you are in the heart of the Tokaj region. The town of Tokaj is literally “just up the road” from Tarcal.
reviews.title: Impressive SPA..wish we had stayed longer!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is a substantially built, modern establishment, but built to reflect former times of building and hospitality in old Hungary. Warm in winter and cool in summer, this is the place to rest and enjoy the life that you have missed stuck behind that desk that earns you the money to visit restful places like Tarcal.
reviews.title: Fabulous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful hotel, spacious, bright and comfortable bedrooms and a great spa! You can choose from several massage and beauty treatments as well.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was delicious and the staff could not be more helpful. - We have even received a welcome glass of wine when we arrived to the reception desk!
reviews.title: perfect choice in tokaj

reviews.text: I am travelling a lot in the UK and I am usually quite critical about the hotels and the service I receive however on this occasion could not pick on anything I did not love!
reviews.title: A real 5 star experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place, could recommend for everyone.
reviews.title: Pearl of Tokaj region/Tokaji vidékének gyöngye

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.text: This is a wonderful hotel, probably seeming more so after several days of "roughing it" in Eastern Europe. It's situated near Tokaj, 2-3 hours driving from Budapest, in the Hungarian wine region and you can tuck in as soon as you walk in the door! The countryside around the hotel is beautiful and there's quite a bit to see if you can drag yourself outside. We loved it all; the lovely bedrooms, the fabulous spa with some 5 or 6 different saunas and wonderful pool and the sightseeing. The hotel restaurant is really good, with dinner menus centred about the local wines, and a great breakfast buffet. Overall, a really great detour from busy Budapest.
reviews.title: Loved the Andrassy!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We planned to stay 2 night but ended up staying 3 because we enjoyed is so much.
reviews.title: A great weekend!

reviews.text: The wellness is really great! You have jacuzzies in the caves, a large swimming pool, 4 kinds of Sauna, massage etc, etc. and in a luxurious style.
reviews.title: The usual hungarian story. Nice try but falls flat.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is very friendly. Breakfast and dinner (we had half board) is decent, but nothing special.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel with organizing issues

reviews.text: The room is really good, spacious, clean, well equipped (flat screen TV with lot's of channels), and it was sweet to have a view on a local neighbour.
reviews.title: Hidden Oasis - Find a Reason to Stay!
